com.gea.time

Class CountDown

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gea.time.CountDown

  • public class CountDown
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a countdown. You can set a how long it is gonna run for and you can detect when the countdown is done
    Author:
    Joakim

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the countdown.

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the countdown. Usually just used when the countdown is already started.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pauses the countdown. You can call the start() function to resume.
        It will then start to count down from where you left off.

      • finish

        public void finish()
        Called when the program has registered that the countdown is done.

      • setTime

        public void setTime(int seconds)
        Sets how long you want the countdown to run for
        Parameters:
        seconds - - how long you want the countdown to run for

      • isStarted

        public boolean isStarted()
        Returns:
        true - if the countdown is started
        false - if the countdown is not started

      • isDone

        public boolean isDone()
        Returns:
        true - if the countdown is done
        false - if the countdown is not done

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Returns:
        true - if the countdown is running false - if the countdown is not running

      • setFinishAction

        public void setFinishAction(Action finishAction)
        Sets the action executed when the countdown is donee
        Parameters:
        finishAction- - action executed when the countdown is done

      • getFinishAction

        public Action getFinishAction()
        Returns:
        The action executed when the countdown is done
